thread.title: Here’s a Closer Look at the COMME des GARÇONS x Nike “Clear” Dunk High
thread.title_full: Here’s a Closer Look at the COMME des GARÇONS x Nike “Clear” Dunk High

author: Jake Boyer
title: Here’s a Closer Look at the COMME des GARÇONS x Nike “Clear” Dunk High
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
Last week, the sneaker world flew into a fury (the good kind) when news broke of a collaboration between COMME des GARÇONS and Nike on a truly luxe edition of the Dunk High sneaker in a “Clear” variety. It was, unfortunately, apparently only available to customers in Japan and Lil Yachty. In spite of this, we were able to get our hands on a pair to give you a closer look, which you can see above.
And that’s not the only bit of good news. Over the weekend, the sneaker became available at COMME des GARÇONS and Dover Street Market stores around the world, retailing for $320. No word yet on whether Nike will release the sneaker, but stay tuned.
First seen last week at Paris Fashion Week, the COMME des GARÇONS x Nike Dunk High “Clear” boasts an upper of black and cream, Swoosh branding on the tongue, CDG branding on the heel and PVC side panels.
In other Nike news, the brand has recently announced that it will be launching the Special Field Air Force 1 sneaker in four new colorways. Check them out right here .
